quotes.text: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: A professional writer is an amateur who didn’t quit.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: You can always edit a bad page. You can’t edit a blank page.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.text: Start before you’re ready. Start where you are.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield
